-- | Bindings to chainFlyer's API.
--   
--   Please see README.md
@package chainFlyer
@version 0.1.0.0


module ChainFlyer.Types

-- | Block.
data Block
Block :: String -> Int -> Bool -> Int -> String -> String -> UTCTime -> Integer -> Integer -> Int -> Integer -> [String] -> Block
[blockHash] :: Block -> String
[blockHeight] :: Block -> Int
[blockIsMain] :: Block -> Bool
[blockVersion] :: Block -> Int
[blockPrevBlock] :: Block -> String
[blockMerkleRoot] :: Block -> String
[blockTimestamp] :: Block -> UTCTime
[blockBits] :: Block -> Integer
[blockNonce] :: Block -> Integer
[blockTxnum] :: Block -> Int
[blockTotalFees] :: Block -> Integer
[blockTxHashes] :: Block -> [String]

-- | Input of a transaction.
data TransactionInput
TransactionInput :: String -> Integer -> Integer -> String -> String -> Integer -> TransactionInput
[txiPrevHash] :: TransactionInput -> String
[txiPrevIndex] :: TransactionInput -> Integer
[txiValue] :: TransactionInput -> Integer
[txiScript] :: TransactionInput -> String
[txiAddress] :: TransactionInput -> String
[txiSequence] :: TransactionInput -> Integer

-- | Output of a transaction.
data TransactionOutput
TransactionOutput :: Integer -> String -> String -> TransactionOutput
[txoValue] :: TransactionOutput -> Integer
[txoScript] :: TransactionOutput -> String
[txoAddress] :: TransactionOutput -> String

-- | Transaction.
data Transaction
Transaction :: String -> Int -> Int -> Integer -> Int -> UTCTime -> Int -> Int -> [TransactionInput] -> [TransactionOutput] -> Transaction
[txHash] :: Transaction -> String
[txBlockHeight] :: Transaction -> Int
[txConfirmed] :: Transaction -> Int
[txFees] :: Transaction -> Integer
[txSize] :: Transaction -> Int
[txReceivedDate] :: Transaction -> UTCTime
[txVersion] :: Transaction -> Int
[txLockTime] :: Transaction -> Int
[txInputs] :: Transaction -> [TransactionInput]
[txOutputs] :: Transaction -> [TransactionOutput]

-- | Address.
data Address
Address :: String -> Integer -> Integer -> Address
[address] :: Address -> String
[unconfirmedBalance] :: Address -> Integer
[confirmedBalance] :: Address -> Integer
instance GHC.Show.Show ChainFlyer.Types.Address
instance GHC.Show.Show ChainFlyer.Types.Transaction
instance GHC.Show.Show ChainFlyer.Types.TransactionOutput
instance GHC.Show.Show ChainFlyer.Types.TransactionInput
instance GHC.Show.Show ChainFlyer.Types.Block
instance Data.Aeson.Types.Class.FromJSON ChainFlyer.Types.Block
instance Data.Aeson.Types.Class.FromJSON ChainFlyer.Types.TransactionInput
instance Data.Aeson.Types.Class.FromJSON ChainFlyer.Types.TransactionOutput
instance Data.Aeson.Types.Class.FromJSON ChainFlyer.Types.Transaction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.Class.FromJSON ChainFlyer.Types.Address


module ChainFlyer

-- | Get block info of given hash.
getBlock :: String -> IO Block

-- | Get block info of given height.
getBlockHeight :: Int -> IO Block

-- | Get latest block info.
getLatestBlock :: IO Block

-- | Get transaction info of given hash.
getTransaction :: String -> IO Transaction

-- | Get address info of given hash.
getAddress :: String -> IO Address
